p: The models of future expansion of ORO, MAY, SLE and ROC in Brazil were then projected into the timeline, and the two future climatic conditions (2046–2065 and 2071–2100), to identify areas suitable for those diseases. A map of raw temperature projections from the GCMs used to drive the disease models can be seen at S1 Fig. The default Maxent auto feature setting was used (linear, quadratic, product, threshold, and hinge). The maps were edited using QGis software 2.10.1.
